summary: The gang go to Australia to investigate the recent disappearances of the performances at the music festivals, by the so called 'Yowie Yahoo'.
cast: Casey Kasem|Frank Welker|Nicole Jaffe|Heather North|Jeff Bennett|Kimberly Brooks|Jennifer Hale|Tom Kenny|Phil LaMarr|Michael Neill|Kevin Michael Richardson|Jane Wiedlin
keywords: music festival|rock music|all girl band|camping|direct to video
title: Scooby-Doo! y la leyenda del vampiro
